front.title: Remote Posture Assessment for Systems, Containers, and Applications at Scale

abstract.t: This document establishes an architectural pattern whereby a remote attestation could be issued for a complete set of benchmarks or controls that are defined and grouped by an external entity, eliminating the need to send over individual attestations for each item within a benchmark or control framework. This document establishes a pattern to list sets of benchmarks and controls within CWT and JWT formats for use as an Entity Attestation Token (EAT). While the discussion below pertains mostly to TPM, other Roots of Trust such as TCG DICE, and non-TCG defined components will also be included.
